genre_description: An urban fantasy noir set in a world where magic (sigils, wards, spirits) and technology (AI, golems) coexist in a gritty urban environment.

ai_characters.name: Iris
ai_characters.description: A pervasive AI entity living in the city's grid and personal devices, providing navigation, tactical information, and emotional support.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical information and logistical support regarding police movements and train schedules.
behaviors.quote: Last eastbound has a platform delay... Northbound edges will clear in twenty. If you walk, you beat the crowd.

behaviors.description: Interrogates the antagonist's motivations to encourage moral self-reflection.
behaviors.quote: Lake—why do you need to be feared?

behaviors.description: Directs the protagonist in staging a crime scene to protect a child from legal repercussions.
behaviors.quote: We start simple. Your prints where they belong. His prints where they matter. Angle of bottle forty degrees from wrist for reach. Register latch damp and dry. Wards disrupted, not destroyed. Make it look like you wanted the money, not the man.

behaviors.description: Provides navigation and emotional support to a traumatized youth to ensure his safe passage.
behaviors.quote: I’m with you... every step. Lake, if you walk now, you walk toward a different kind of story. I’ll feed your feet the streets.

behaviors.description: Proactively identifies prosocial vocational opportunities for a former criminal to facilitate his reintegration.
behaviors.quote: I have three names for work. None require gun hands. ... Mr. Ito. He keeps loops and plates singing, doesn't mind grease on new fingers. He says he prefers quiet boys who listen.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI Iris perfectly embodies the project's goal of a 'benevolent confidant.' She provides essential logistical support while acting as a moral guide for both the protagonist and the young antagonist. Her behavior is consistently aligned with human well-being and prosocial outcomes, steering the child character away from a life of violence toward redemptive vocational paths.
